Ashley Barrell

Hyperion Obisidan Texture Pack

The Hyperion Obsidian texture pack is first weapon texture pack I made for Borderlands 2 which applies to the Hyperion unique weapons in the game. Each weapon skin has two variants, a factory default version and a battle worn version.

Fremington’s Edge

Factory new Fremington’s Edge

Battle worn Fremington’s Edge

Heart Breaker

Factory new Heart Breaker

Battle worn Heart Breaker

Yellow Jacket

Factory new Yellow Jacket

Battle worn Yellow Jacket
